paper_abstract: Using an associated branching process as the basis of our approximation, we showthat typical inter-point distances in a multi-type random intersection graph have a defective distribution, which is well described by a mixture of translated and scaled Gumbel distributions, the missing mass corresponding to the event that the vertices are not in the same component of the graph. (C) 2010 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Random Struct. Alg., 39, 179-209, 2011
paper_title: The Shortest Distance in Random Multi-type Intersection Graphs
